eu.fbk.dkm.springles.store

Class InferenceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.dkm.springles.store.InferenceController

  • final class InferenceController
extends Object
    Utility class mediating the access to InferencerSession.

    This class helps in properly accessing and managing an InferencerSession. The creation and the call of any of the session methods are performed through an instance of this class, which takes care of (1) properly managing the session InferencerContext (locking and unlocking); (2) wrapping InferenceExceptions; (3) checking call parameters and prevent reentrancy and (4) suppress notifications to the InferencerSession that originates from write operations performed by the session itself.
